alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 10:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1053 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Callahan to near Jacksonville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Jacksonville International Arpt, Arlington, Atlantic Beach, Yulee, Oceanway, Craig Field, Fort Caroline, Riverside and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
